name: The Flopp (updated)
description:
Updated version.

We have decided to upload verison 1.1 due to few bugs that were found (thank you all for feedback!). However the original version is still available in case you preffer to rate games released as per given time-frame.

  • Bit platforms fixed
  • Player animation changes fixed
  • Floppy functions improved
  • Sanguis name corrected in menu :)
